eventParts.text: Hey, do you guys hear that?
It sounds like some vultures. It sounds like a lot of them!
Maybe we don't have to fight them. Maybe we can just sneak closer and eavesdrop.
That sounds like a good idea. Maybe we can figure out why they stole the seeds!
... why they eat seeds. It's gross.
Hey, did you guys hear about Percy? I heard he got thrown in jail for being friends with a bird!
I heard it was even worse than that! I heard he had a bird girlfriend!
Hey Kim, where are you going? Kim?
I'm sorry, I just need to be alone for a while.

eventConsequence.selectionText: Hey, it's okay. You can tell us what's wrong. Does it have to do with being friends with vultures?
eventConsequence.conclusionText: Yeah. I can't believe they would just throw Pe... that they would throw that poor vulture in jail for dating a bird.

eventConsequence.selectionText: You don't have to tell us if you don't want to. But those vultures are real mean, and we're gonna find a way to stop them.
eventConsequence.conclusionText: Yeah! And then we can get Pe... that vulture out of jail!
